itunes:title: healthy girl summer with natalia seliger
title: healthy girl summer with natalia seliger
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
hot girl summer is out...and HEALTHY girl summer is in. this summer we're working on removing the guilt we have around this time of year. we are all too hard on ourselves to look a certain way, but it's time to realize that health is how you FEEL. not how you look. join britt & nat as they talk about all things healthy girl summer, tips, affirmations and positive self talk, favorite recipes, grocery staples and more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

2:10 Reviews of the week

3:30 welcome Natalia

5:20 All about Natalia

7:10 Bali

10:00 affirmations

12:40 don't scroll in the morning

14:47 Summer guilt

20:10 getting out of your head

22:00 That Girl Trend

23:10 what does health mean to me?

28:00 you can have both

31:40 diet culture

35:20 unfollow to unlearn

36:30 find what works for you

39:50 fav recipes

46:50 Whole Foods vs TJoes

48:30 grocery staples

51:43 one thing you'd tell your younger self
